coffees.name: Affogato
coffees.description: A shot of separately served espresso that is later poured over a the top of a scoop of vanilla ice cream or gelato. Served in a short drink glass and is a Italian desert favourite. Popular Affogatos include Vanilla Affogato, Mocha Affogato, and Peppermint Affogato.
coffees.label: cold beverage

coffees.name: Americano
coffees.description: Also known as 'Lungo' or 'Long Black' and made by diluting 1-2 shots of espresso with hot water in order to approximate the texture, flavor and body of an American-style drip coffee. Said to have been originally devised as a sort of insult to Americans who wanted their Italian espresso diluted.
coffees.label: hot beverage

coffees.name: Babycino
coffees.description: A cappuccino styled drink served in an up-market café typically for children. It consists of warm milk in a small cup and topped with milk froth and chocolate powder. No espresso coffee essence is added.
coffees.label: hot beverage

coffees.name: Breve
coffees.description: A term in Italian that means short and is used to describe an espresso coffee drink made with a half-and-half light cream or semi-skim milk instead of full fat milk
coffees.label: hot beverage

coffees.name: Caffe' Freddo
coffees.description: Chilled, sweetened espresso served in a tall glass, often on ice
coffees.label: cold beverage

coffees.name: Latte
coffees.description: A ‘premium milk coffee experience’. Freshly steamed milk without foam served in a tall glass with a shot of espresso coffee.
coffees.label: hot beverage

coffees.name: Caffe Mocha
coffees.description: A combination of chocolate syrup and a shot of espresso, topped with steamed milk and a layer of micro-foam.
coffees.label: hot beverage

coffees.name: Cappuccino Chiaro
coffees.description: Cappuccino prepared with more milk than usual.
coffees.label: hot beverage

coffees.name: Cappuccino Scuro
coffees.description: Cappuccino prepared with less milk than usual.
coffees.label: hot beverage
